mapper.insert: insert into detect_records(detect_person_id, project_id, description, date, image) values (#{detectPersonId}, #{projectId}, #{description}, #{date}, #{image})
mapper.select: select id, description, date, project_id as projectId, detect_person_id as detectPersonId, image from detect_records where project_id = #{projectId}
select image from detect_records where id = #{id}
